system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Axes)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.MTbNQ0q4AensGsif]{Axe Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.YVtppsdK3LWwitEY]{Axe Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding a battle-axe, broadaxe, or hand axe, the character gains an additional +1 damage die, and the character may treat any damage as bludgeoning as well, for the purpose of defeating a defenderâ€™s armor
system.summary: Another +1 damage die, attack bludgeoning DR
